metadata.title: CVE-2022-48642 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nf_tables: fix percpu memory leak at nf_tables_addchain() Itseems to me that percpu memory for chain stats started leaking since commit3bc158f8d0330f0a ("netfilter: nf_tables: map basechain priority to hardwarepriority") when nft_chain_offload_priority() returned an error.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
